column4: W: Couldn't stat source package list http://us.archive.ubuntu.com breezy-backports/main Packages (/var/lib/apt/lists/us.archive.ubuntu.com_ubuntu_dists_breezy-backports_main_binary-i386_Packages) - stat (2 No such file or directory)
in that window, find the lines that have 'breezy-backports' in them and put a # at the beginning of those lines
you should have 2 lines with breezy-backports in them, make sure theres a # in front of both
save it, and run "sudo apt-get update"
can you paste your /etc/apt/sources.list to a pastebin?
open your terminal and type "gedit /etc/apt/sources.list". copy it and paste it at the pastebin URL ubotu sent you
when you are done, bring us the URL to the pastebin
you need to tell us which method you are gonna use
